text:
[Verse]
Feel the raindrops on my skin
Laughing loud in the wind
Spinning in the puddles clear
Dancing away every fear

[Verse 2]
Clouds above they start to break
Splashes on the steps I take
Joyful moments in the storm
Twirling where the light is warm

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain tonight
Worries gone it feels so right
Jumping high in water's beat
Rhythm guides my happy feet

[Verse 3]
Streetlights shimmer in the dark
Heartbeats racing leave a mark
Smiles shared with all around
In the rain our joy is found

[Bridge]
Let the raindrops kiss my face
In this wild and free embrace
Every splash a brand new start
Raindrops dancing from the heart

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain tonight
Worries gone it feels so right
Jumping high in water's beat
Rhythm guides my happy feet
title: Dancing in the Rain
